2090840.name: Diamond Skeeball
2090840.description:
TRANSFORM YOUR STREAM INTO A VIRTUAL ARCADE

Diamond SkeeBall isn't just a gameâ€”it's a powerful community engagement tool designed exclusively for live streamers. Bring the nostalgia of the boardwalk arcade directly to your broadcast and give your viewers the controller!

Whether you need a high-energy intermission, a raid-friendly welcome event, or a fun way to reward your community, Diamond SkeeBall turns passive viewers into active players.

ğŸ® TRUE INTERACTIVITY

Forget about overlay extensions that require external downloads. Diamond SkeeBall connects directly to your Twitch chat.

Chat Commads:Â Viewers simply type `!roll` to join the queue and launch a ball.

Channel Points Integration: Seamlessly syncs with your Twitch Channel Points. Let your loyal subs redeem points for "Multi-Balls" (x2, x3) or even change the entire game machine mode on the fly!

Custom Physics: Every roll is calculated with real-time physics, ensuring no two shots are ever the same.

ğŸ† COMMUNITY COMPETITION

Spark a friendly rivalry in your chat!

Live Leaderboards:Â The game tracks lifetime scores for every single user. Who will be your channel's SkeeBall Champion?

Personalized Skins:Â When a viewer plays, the game automatically fetches their Twitch profile picture and applies it to their ball. Itâ€™s their moment to shine on screen!

Steam Achievements: Unlock special milestones as your community grows, plays, and hits high scores together.

ğŸ¤– STREAMER-FIRST DESIGN

We know how chaotic live streaming can be. Diamond SkeeBall is built to handle it.

Intelligent Queue System:Â Got raided by 100 people? No problem. The automated queue lines up every request and executes them one by one. You can sit back and narrate the action while the game handles the traffic.

Simple Setup: Log in with your Twitch account and you're ready to go in seconds.

Custom Brandng:Your channel logo is featured prominently in the arena, making the experience feel like *your* custom game.

ğŸš€ JOIN THE BETA

Diamond SkeeBall is currently in active Beta. We are constantly listening to streamer feedback to add new features, game modes, and tools to help you grow. Please Contact Support Via Our Discord if u are intrested in beta testing.

COMING SOON:

Ball Skin Store: A dedicated shop where you can unlock exclusive, high-quality skins to customize the look of your game even further.
